thread.title: Man in his 20s raped in Rochdale park - Manchester Evening News
thread.title_full: Man in his 20s raped in Rochdale park - Manchester Evening News

author: Alexandra Rucki
title: Man in his 20s raped in Rochdale park - Manchester Evening News
text:
Man in his 20s raped in Rochdale park Police have launched an investigation following the attack on Sunday morning Share Broadfield Park in Rochdale (Photo: Rept0n1x/ Wiki Commons) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Detectives have launched an investigation after a man was raped in a park. 
The victim, aged in his 20s, was raped in Broadfield Park, Rochdale , shortly before 12.15am on Sunday, February 5. 
Investigators are currently at the scene carrying out further enquiries. 
Specially trained officers are supporting the victim. Read More 
A 36-year-old man was raped in the same park on November 1, last year. 
The victim was held down by one attacker, as the other sexually assaulted him. 
Police are appealing for any witnesses or anyone with further information to come forward. 
Anyone with any information should call police on 101 quoting incident number 31 of February 5, 2017. Like us on Facebook
